Self.Wiki: Determines various parameters for character models.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

texMemoryType.Wiki: Memory type used by model textures.

cameraDitherFadeId.Wiki: Camera fade parameter ID (-1 refer to material, 0: do not disappear, 1 parameter ID)

isNoRayTracing.Wiki: If OFF, then character model will be included in raytracing scene. If ON, then character is skipped.

rayTracingCullingMode.Wiki: Culling mode applied when drawing raytracing. If it is set to 'Auto', it will be the default value set in the program.
